reference.p: Bloom, Justin L., Shinsuke Asano (1981) Tsukuba Science City: Japan tries planned innovation. Science, Vol.212, No. 4500, pp. 1239-1247, 12 June 1981 https://www.jstor.org/stable/1685782.
